chapter.title: Definitions
chapter.para: In every non-toy program, the need arises to define new words or redefine and clarify existing words. This is the list of words that are used in pkglint.

listitem.para: A subroutine that is called to obtain a return value, rather than for its side effects. Functions should restrict the user-visible side effects to the necessary minimum.
A subroutine that is not called to obtain a return value, but rather called because of its side effects, like input/output.
